actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for a national educational campaign to improve safety on the highways by improving driver skill, driver attitudes, and driver knowledge of highway regulations.
short_title: Automobile Driver Education and Highway Safety Act

summary.text: Automobile Driver Education and Highway Safety Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to carry on a national education campaign designed to educate drivers and pedestrians as to the danger of driving on, or crossing the highways. Authorizes appropriations of $85,000,000 for fiscal year 1977 and for each of the two succeeding fiscal years to carry out such program.

titles.title: Automobile Driver Education and Highway Safety Act
A bill to provide for a national educational campaign to improve safety on the highways by improving driver skill, driver attitudes, and driver knowledge of highway regulations.
